summary: BuildRequest contains no stated requirements or acceptance criteria. The diff introduces multiple functional changes (backend image storage APIs, frontend switching to static portfolio data and simulated contact submission, and various UI/content/deployment-documentation updates) that are not traceable to any requested requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed backend functionality to store images and query/sort them (addImg, getJpgs, Img type, blob-storage mixin).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest to justify implementing image storage/query APIs.

hallucinated_features.description: Replaced backend-driven portfolio querying with static local portfolio data and introduced simulated contact form submission.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided; diff explicitly states backend no longer supports portfolio/contact and adds placeholder behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/modified multiple frontend sections, types, data content, SEO title/canonical link, theming, and deployment documentation per file summaries.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest; these changes are additional scope not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project state to track new feature requests about deployment/public URL and ICP gateway reachability.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest had no requirements; these tracked requests are newly introduced in state without corresponding source-of-truth requirements.
